name: Fix Slack Meeting Debrief Bugs
description: Three bugs in the Slack meeting debrief: sentiment score shows 0.71% instead of 71%, summary markdown **bold** renders literally, and task Add buttons fail on non-existent org_id column.

stories.title: Fix sentiment score normalization (0-1 â†’ 0-100)
acceptance: Coaching overall_score of 0.71 displays as 'Positive (71%)' not 'Challenging (0.71%)'
Score of 0 is handled (not skipped by falsy check)
Scores already in 0-100 range pass through unchanged

stories.title: Fix markdown bold rendering in Slack summary
acceptance: Summary text no longer shows literal ** markers

stories.title: Fix task creation column names in Slack interactive handler
acceptance: Single 'Add' task button creates task without error
'Add All Tasks' bulk button creates all tasks without error
Tasks appear in the app with correct assignee and org
